hero.title: Where Beauty Meets Artistry
hero.subtitle: Experience luxury beauty treatments in a relaxing, sophisticated environment. Our expert stylists create personalized looks that enhance your natural radiance.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Indulge in our comprehensive range of premium beauty treatments, each designed to enhance your natural beauty.

hairStyling.title: Hair Styling
hairStyling.description: Expert cuts, coloring, and styling for all hair types. Our master stylists create personalized looks.

facialTreatments.title: Facial Treatments
facialTreatments.description: Rejuvenating facials using premium skincare products to restore your natural glow.

nailArt.title: Nail Art
nailArt.description: Manicures, pedicures, and artistic nail designs using top-quality products.

makeup.title: Makeup Artistry
makeup.description: Professional makeup for any occasion, from natural everyday looks to glamorous events.

spa.title: Spa & Wellness
spa.description: Relaxing massages and body treatments to rejuvenate your body and mind.

bridal.title: Bridal Services
bridal.description: Complete bridal packages including hair, makeup, and spa treatments for your special day.

gallery.title: Our Work
gallery.subtitle: Browse through our portfolio of stunning transformations and beautiful results.

team.title: Meet Our Artists
team.subtitle: Our team of skilled professionals is dedicated to bringing out your best self.

sofia.name: Sofia Rodriguez
sofia.bio: With over 15 years of experience, Sofia brings creative vision and technical mastery to every client.

alex.name: Alexander Chen
alex.bio: Alex specializes in balayage, ombre, and creative color techniques that enhance natural beauty.

maria.name: Maria Volkov
maria.bio: Maria's holistic approach to skincare combines traditional techniques with modern innovations.

james.name: James Mitchell
james.bio: James creates stunning looks for weddings, photoshoots, and special occasions.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Discover why our clients keep coming back for their beauty needs.

review1.name: Emma Thompson
review1.text: Absolutely love my new hair! Sofia really listened to what I wanted and the result exceeded my expectations. The salon atmosphere is so relaxing too.

review2.name: Dilnoza Karimova
review2.text: The facial treatment was incredible. My skin has never looked better. Maria really knows her craft and makes you feel so comfortable.

review3.name: Olga Petrova
review3.text: I've been coming here for years and wouldn't go anywhere else. The team is professional, friendly, and always up-to-date with the latest trends.

contact.title: Book Your Experience
contact.subtitle: Ready to transform your look? Get in touch with us to schedule your appointment.
